headline: Citizens Financial Group (CFG) valuation after earnings beat and prime lending rate cut prompts closer investor review
summary: Citizens Financial Group (CFG) has had an eventful stretch, pairing a narrow earnings and revenue beat with a cut in its prime lending rate to 6.75%, a move that directly shapes borrowing demand. See our latest analysis for Citizens Financial Group. The market seems to be warming to that mix of solid execution and a more competitive lending stance. A 30 day share price return of 11.67 percent supports a year to date share price gain of 34.08 percent and a five year total shareholder return...
